heisig_chinese_memo: Inside the city walls all the neighbors put out the same style of jack-o-lanterns during halloween.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The people in the city walls receive orders from the government not to build their houses/apartments too high because it will block sunlight from the neighbors.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Yi " and " Tang ", the original meaning is ancient administrative unit. "Shuowen": "Five families are neighbors. From the town, the sound is the sound." "Zhou Li‧Diguan‧Suiren": "Five families are neighbors, and the five neighbors are neighbors."

" Neighbors " can refer to neighbors, neighboring countries, and neighbors. "Poetry‧Xiaoya‧Zhengyue": "Qia compared to its neighbors, fainted by marriage." Mao Chuan: "Nearby, close."

" Neighbor " can also mean a close minister of the monarch. "Twelve Years of Zuo Zhuan-Zhaogong": "From me, those who go to me are contemptuous, and those who are neighbors are ashamed!"

" Neighbor " also means closeness and closeness. "Confucius' Family Language-Five Instruments Explanation": "The one who sees it does not know his neighbors." Wang Su's note: "Neighbors are just a metaphor for the boundary."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Yi ", " lin " sound, the original meaning of the ancient Xingzhengdanwei.
humanum_full_description:
從「邑」，「粦」聲，本義為古代行政單位。《說文》：「五家爲鄰。从邑，粦聲。」《周禮‧地官‧遂人》：「五家為鄰，五鄰為里。」

　　「鄰」可指鄰居、鄰國、鄰境。《詩‧小雅‧正月》：「洽比其鄰，昏姻孔云。」毛傳：「鄰，近。」

　　「鄰」也可表示君主的近臣。《左傳‧昭公十二年》：「從我者子乎，去我者鄙乎，倍其鄰者恥乎！」杜預注：「鄰，猶親也。」

　　「鄰」還表示親密、親近。《孔子家語‧五儀解》：「睹者不識其鄰。」王肅注：「鄰，以喻界畔也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「邑」，「粦」聲，本義為古代行政單位。

"Twelve Years of Zuo Zhuan-Zhaogong": "From me, those who go to me are contemptuous, and those who are neighbors are ashamed!" " Neighbor" also means closeness and closeness. 鄰字的基本解释

鄰
lín
见“邻”。

鄰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
［《廣韻》力珍切，平真，來。］
“厸1”的今字。亦作“吅2”。“邻1”的繁体字。亦作“隣1”。
(1)古代行政单位。（1）五家为邻。《周礼·地官·遂人》：“五家爲鄰，五鄰爲里。”《汉书·食货志上》：“五家爲鄰，五鄰爲里。”（2）八家为邻。《尚书大传》卷四：“古者處師，八家爲鄰，三鄰而爲朋。”《韩诗外传》卷四：“八家爲鄰，家得百畝。”《晋书·地理志上》：“昔在帝堯，叶和萬邦，制八家爲鄰，三鄰爲朋。”（3）四家为邻。宋李上交《近事会元·乡里邻保坊村》：“唐高祖武德七年令云，百户爲里，五里爲鄉，四家爲鄰，五家爲保。”《旧唐书·职官志二》：“四家爲鄰，五鄰爲保。”
(2)古代行政单位。八家为邻。
(3)古代行政单位。四家为邻。
(4)指邻居；邻国；邻境。
(5)古称君主的近臣。
(6)指亲近的人。
(7)亲密，亲近。
(8)靠近；连接。
(9)界畔。
(10)近似；相仿。
(11)坚实，紧密。
(12)见“鄰菌”。
(13)通“燐”。燐火。
(14)通“磷”。
(15)姓。<

鄰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄰； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1278第08
〔古文〕厸【唐韻】力珍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】離珍切，?音粼。【廣韻】近也，親也。【正韻】比也。【釋名】鄰，連也。相接連也。【周禮·地官·遂人】五家爲鄰，五鄰爲里。　又連界之國，亦稱鄰。【書·蔡仲之命】睦乃四鄰。　又左右輔弼亦曰鄰。【書·益稷】臣哉鄰哉。【註】臣以人言，鄰以職言。　又車聲。與轔通。【詩·秦風】有車鄰鄰。【註】衆車聲。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?良刃切，音吝。與甐通。【集韻】敝也。【正韻】動也。【周禮·冬官考工記】輪雖敝，不甐于鑿。【註】以輪之厚，石雖齧之，不能敝其鑿，旁使之動也。甐，本又作鄰。　又叶陵延切，音連。【陸機·挽歌】人往有反歲，我行無歸年。昔居四民宅，今託萬鬼鄰。　【正字通】本作鄰，隸作隣。今通作鄰。

鄰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
adjacent
lín
See "neighbor".
adjacent
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lín］
["Guang Yun", cherish and cut it, plain, come. ]
The present character of "厸1". Also known as "吅2". Traditional Chinese characters for "side 1". Also known as "neighbor 1".
(1) Ancient administrative unit. (1) Five families are neighbors. "Zhou Li·Diguan·Suiren": "Five families are neighbors, and five neighbors are neighbors." "Han Shu·Shihuo Zhi 1": "Five families are neighbors, and five neighbors are neighbors." (2) Eight families For neighbors. "Shangshu Dazhuan" Volume 4: "The ancients are masters, the eight families are neighbors, and the three neighbors are friends." "Han Shiwaizhuan" Volume 4: "Eight families are neighbors, and the family has a hundred acres." "Book of Jin. "First Geography": "In the past in Emperor Yao, Ye He Wanbang, made eight neighbors, and three neighbors as friends." (3) Four neighbors. Song Li handed in "Xinshihuiyuan·Xiangli Linbaofang Village": "Tang Gaozu's martial arts in seven years led the cloud, hundreds of households are li, five li is the township, four are neighbors, and five are guarantors." "Old Tang Book · Official Records II": "Four families are neighbors, and five neighbors are guarantee."
(2) Ancient administrative unit. Eight families are neighbors.
(3) Ancient administrative units. The four are neighbors.
(4) Refers to neighbors; neighboring countries; neighboring borders.
(5) The close minister of the monarch in ancient times.
(6) Refers to a close person.
(7) Closeness and closeness.
(8) Close to; connect.
(9) Boundary side.
(10) Approximate; similar.
(11) Solid and tight.
(12) See "Neighboring Bacteria".
(13) Through "燐". Burning fire.
(14) Through "phosphorus".
(15) Last name.
adjacent
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　 Lin; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1278 08
[Ancient text] [Tang Yun] Li Zhen cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] cut from Zhen,? Yin Lin. [Guang Yun] Near and dear. [Zheng Yun] Bi Ye. [Release name] Neighbor, even. Successively. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Suiren】Five families are neighbors, and five neighbors are neighbors.　The kingdom of the borders, also known as neighbors. [Book·Cai Zhong’s Life] Harmony is our neighbors.　Auxiliary Bi is also called neighbor. 【Book·Yiji】The minister is the neighbor. [Note] The ministers use people's words, and the neighbors use their jobs.　The sound of cars again. Connect with Chu. [Poetry·Qin Feng] There are cars next to each other. [Note] The sound of cars.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Good blade cut, sound stingy. Tongtong. 【Ji Yun】I also. [Zheng Yun] Moving too. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Although the wheel is awkward, it is indifferent. [Note] With the thickness of the wheel, although the stone bites it, it cannot be chiseled and moved by the side. Nei, Ben is a neighbor again.　 Ye Ling cuts again, the sound is continuous. [Lu Ji·Elegy] People turn back to life, but we never return to life. In the past, he lived in four houses, and now it is a neighbor of thousands of ghosts.　【Zhengzitong】This is a neighbor, and a subordinate is a neighbor. Today we are neighbors.
